attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel we should abolish the UK and create 4 Independant Countries.I feel that the current state of affiars is unjust to the english.As the scottish Mps can vote on English affairs but we cannot not vote on Scottish affairs. Also in a recent survey a high perecentage of people from all 4 Countries wanted independant states.
